scripts.get-device-id:ios: xcrun simctl list devices booted | grep -o '[A-F0-9-]\{36\}' | head -1
scripts.get-device-id:android: adb devices | grep -v 'List' | grep 'device$' | awk '{print $1}' | head -1
scripts.set-status-bar:ios: DEVICE_ID=$(bun run get-device-id:ios) && xcrun simctl status_bar $DEVICE_ID override --time '9:41' --dataNetwork wifi --wifiMode active --wifiBars 3 --operatorName "" --batteryState charged --batteryLevel 100 --cellularMode active --cellularBars 4
scripts.set-status-bar:android: adb shell settings put global sysui_demo_allowed 1 && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command enter && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command clock -e hhmm 0941 && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command battery -e level 100 -e plugged false && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command network -e wifi hide && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command network -e mobile hide && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command notifications -e visible false && adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.systemui.demo -e command status -e volume hide -e bluetooth hide -e location hide -e alarm hide -e sync hide -e tty hide -e eri hide -e mute hide -e speakerphone hide -e cast hide
scripts.maestro:ios: bun run set-status-bar:ios && DEVICE_ID=$(bun run get-device-id:ios) && maestro --device $DEVICE_ID test .maestro/app-flow.yaml
scripts.maestro:android: bun run set-status-bar:android && DEVICE_ID=$(bun run get-device-id:android) && maestro --device $DEVICE_ID test .maestro/app-flow.yaml
scripts.maestro:all: bun run maestro:ios && sleep 5 && bun run maestro:android
scripts.ci: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test
